about_the_game:
What happens when a world made of light loses its only light source? The world fades as the end draws near, and everything becomes a desperate bid for survival.

TAKE UP THE MANTLE OF WARRIOR OF SPIRIT
In the story book world of Lusvald, the sole source of light has been stolen, causing the world to darken into a harsh wasteland full of shadows and beasts. Tasked with restoring the Sun Prism, a young child who awakens in this world must learn to overcome his fears and face the darkness that threatens to devour the world of dreams.

FIGHT
Mythstal: Shadow of the Sun is a traditional turn-based RPG with a twist of action thrown into the combat. Build a team of warriors, map their spells, skills, and abilities to an ability wheel, and prepare to slash, smash, and bash your way through hordes of shadow beasts, and solve ancient puzzles and riddles.

GROW
The more light you return to this fading land, the more equipment, spells, and allies you will have at your disposal. Gain new abilities and unlock hidden secrets to become the best warrior you can be.

REBUILD
With each new area you relight, you will meet new and wonderful creatures, characters, and cultures, and learn new lore to deepen your understanding of the calamity that befell this world. You must learn just what it means to bear the title "Warrior of Spirit."

Can you be the brave knight who saved the sun?

name: Mythstal: Shadow of the Sun
short_description: Experience new life breathed into a tried-and-true formula. Mythstal: Shadow of the Sun is a fast-paced, turn-based RPG with a focus on quick thinking and fluid team building. Revive the world around you to grow your arsenal, your team, and your skills, in a frantic race against a fading world.
